artistname.name: artistname
artistname.title: Artist Title ( line 1 )
artistname.sidenote: title to appear on the left top

config.name: config
config.title: Audio Player Configuration
config.sidenote: the audio player configuration , can be edited in ZoomSounds > Player Configurations {[dzsapEditConfigLink]}

type_normal_stream_type.name: type_normal_stream_type
type_normal_stream_type.title: Stream type
type_normal_stream_type.sidenote: it can be shoutcast or icecast if you select it

item_source.name: item_source
item_source.title: Source
item_source.sidenote: link to mp3 or soundcloud link

item_thumb.name: item_thumb
item_thumb.title: Thumbnail
item_thumb.sidenote: select a thumbnail for the song

post_content.name: post_content
post_content.title: Description
post_content.sidenote: this description will appear if the Info button is enabled in the Player Configuration

playfrom.name: playfrom
playfrom.title: Play from
playfrom.sidenote: choose a number of seconds from which the track to play from ( for example if set "70" then the track will start to play from 1 minute and 10 seconds ) or input "last" for the track to play at the last position where it was.

play_in_footer_player.name: play_in_footer_player
play_in_footer_player.title: Play in footer player
play_in_footer_player.sidenote: optional - play this track in the footer player ( footer player must be setuped on the page )

enable_download_button.name: enable_download_button
enable_download_button.title: Enable Download Button
enable_download_button.sidenote: optional - Enable Download Button for this track

enable_downloads_counter.name: enable_downloads_counter
enable_downloads_counter.title: Enable Download Counter
enable_downloads_counter.sidenote: optional - Enable Download Counter for this track

download_custom_link_enable.name: download_custom_link_enable
download_custom_link_enable.title: Enable custom download link
download_custom_link_enable.sidenote: enable a custom download link for the button ( input below )

download_custom_link.name: download_custom_link
download_custom_link.title: Custom Link Download
download_custom_link.sidenote: a custom link for the download button - clicknig it will go to this link if set, if it is not set then it will just download the track

item_extra_classes_player.name: item_extra_classes_player
item_extra_classes_player.title: Extra Classes
item_extra_classes_player.sidenote: extra html classes applied to the player

replace_menu_songname.name: replace_menu_songname
replace_menu_songname.title: Menu song name
replace_menu_songname.sidenote: Leave nothing in the field for default artist name ( your author name ); input none for nothing in the field, or input a custom name

replace_menu_artistname.name: replace_menu_artistname
replace_menu_artistname.title: Menu artist name
replace_menu_artistname.custom_html: add custom buttons to player

extrahtml_in_bottom_controls_from_player.name: extrahtml_in_bottom_controls_from_player
extrahtml_in_bottom_controls_from_player.title: Extra HTML in Bottom Controls
extrahtml_in_bottom_controls_from_player.sidenote:
extra html on the in the bottom controls, leave nothing here and the content will come from the player configuration, if you have set anything here
demo content: [player_button style="btn-zoomsounds" background_color="#86ccb6" color="#ffffff" label="Twitter" icon="fa-twitter" link="#"]

extrahtml_in_float_right_from_player.name: extrahtml_in_float_right_from_player
extrahtml_in_float_right_from_player.title: Extra HTML in Right Controls
extrahtml_in_float_right_from_player.sidenote:
extra html on the in the bottom controls, leave nothing here and the content will come from the player configuration, if you have set anything here
demo content: [player_button style="player-but" label="Twitter Profile" icon="fa-twitter" link="#"]

cover.name: cover
cover.title: Cover
cover.sidenote: cover image to show before video play

open_in_ultibox.name: open_in_ultibox
open_in_ultibox.title: Open in Ultibox?
open_in_ultibox.sidenote: open the current player in a lightbox

enable_likes.name: enable_likes
enable_likes.title: Enable Likes ?
enable_likes.sidenote-2: you need to have a id to link the player to in the database for the views, likes, etc to be recorded

enable_views.name: enable_views
enable_views.title: Enable Play Count ?
enable_views.sidenote-2: you need to have a id to link the player to in the database for the views, likes, etc to be recorded

enable_rates.name: enable_rates
enable_rates.title: Enable Ratings ?
enable_rates.sidenote-2: you need to have a id to link the player to in the database for the views, likes, etc to be recorded

itunes_link.name: itunes_link
itunes_link.title: iTunes Link
itunes_link.sidenote: input an optional link to the itunes track page

playerid.name: playerid
playerid.title: Link to ID
playerid.sidenote: you need to link to a player id

wrapper_image.name: wrapper_image
wrapper_image.title: Wrapper Image
wrapper_image.sidenote: The source, input a mp4 or a youtube link or a youtube id or a vimeo link or a vimeo id

productid.name: productid
productid.title: Linked product id
productid.sidenote: link a product id to the zoomsounds item
